1.name: Se7en
1.description: Two detectives, a rookie and a veteran, hunt a serial killer who uses the seven deadly sins as his motives.

2.name: Clueless
2.description: A rich high school student tries to boost a new pupil's popularity, but reckons without affairs of the heart getting in the way.

3.name: Casino
3.description: A tale of greed, deception, money, power, and murder occur between two best friends: a mafia enforcer and a casino executive, compete against each other over a gambling empire, and over a fast living and fast loving socialite.

4.name: Casper
4.description: An afterlife therapist and his daughter meet a friendly young ghost when they move into a crumbling mansion in order to rid the premises of wicked spirits.

5.name: Braveheart
5.description: When his secret bride is executed for assaulting an English soldier who tried to rape her, William Wallace begins a revolt against King Edward I of England.

6.name: Heat
6.description: A group of professional bank robbers start to feel the heat from police when they unknowingly leave a clue at their latest heist.

7.name: Toy Story
7.description: A cowboy doll is profoundly threatened and jealous when a new spaceman figure supplants him as top toy in a boy's room.

8.name: Batman Forever
8.description: Batman must battle former district attorney Harvey Dent, who is now Two-Face and Edward Nygma, The Riddler with help from an amorous psychologist and a young circus acrobat who becomes his sidekick, Robin.

9.name: The Usual Suspects
9.description: A sole survivor tells of the twisty events leading up to a horrific gun battle on a boat, which began when five criminals met at a seemingly random police lineup.

10.name: Bad Boys
10.description: Two hip detectives protect a witness to a murder while investigating a case of stolen heroin from the evidence storage room from their police precinct.

11.name: Twelve Monkeys
11.description: In a future world devastated by disease, a convict is sent back in time to gather information about the man-made virus that wiped out most of the human population on the planet.

12.name: Showgirls
12.description: Nomi, a young drifter, arrives in Las Vegas to become a dancer and soon sets about clawing and pushing her way to become the top of the Vegas showgirls.

13.name: Jumanji
13.description: When two kids find and play a magical board game, they release a man trapped for decades in it and a host of dangers that can only be stopped by finishing the game.

14.name: To Die For
14.description: A beautiful but naïve aspiring television personality films a documentary on teenagers with a darker ulterior motive.

15.name: Species
15.description: A group of scientists try to track down and trap a killer alien seductress before she successfully mates with a human.

16.name: GoldenEye
16.description: James Bond teams up with the lone survivor of a destroyed Russian research center to stop the hijacking of a nuclear space weapon by a fellow Agent formerly believed to be dead.

17.name: Now and Then
17.description: Four 12-year-old girls grow up together during an eventful small-town summer in 1970.

18.name: Apollo 13
18.description: NASA must devise a strategy to return Apollo 13 to Earth safely after the spacecraft undergoes massive internal damage putting the lives of the three astronauts on board in jeopardy.

19.name: Kids
19.description: A day in the life of a group of teens as they travel around New York City skating, drinking, smoking and deflowering virgins.

20.name: Waterworld
20.description: In a future where the polar ice-caps have melted and Earth is almost entirely submerged, a mutated mariner fights starvation and outlaw "smokers," and reluctantly helps a woman and a young girl try to find dry land.

21.name: Judge Dredd
21.description: In a dystopian future, Joseph Dredd, the most famous Judge (a police officer with instant field judiciary powers), is convicted for a crime he did not commit and must face his murderous counterpart.

22.name: Friday
22.description: Two homies, Smokey and Craig, smoke a dope dealer's weed and try to figure a way to get the $200 they owe to the dealer by 10 p.m. that same night.

23.name: Mortal Kombat
23.description: Three unknowing martial artists are summoned to a mysterious island to compete in a tournament whose outcome will decide the fate of the world.

24.name: The Quick and the Dead
24.description: A female gunfighter returns to a frontier town where a dueling tournament is being held, which she enters in an effort to avenge her father's death.

25.name: Empire Records
25.description: 24 hours in the lives of the young employees at Empire Records when they all grow up and become young adults thanks to each other and the manager. They all face the store joining a chain store with strict rules.

26.name: Before Sunrise
26.description: A young man and woman meet on a train in Europe, and wind up spending one evening together in Vienna. Unfortunately, both know that this will probably be their only night together.

27.name: Die Hard: With a Vengeance
27.description: John McClane and a Harlem store owner are targeted by German terrorist Simon Gruber in New York City, where he plans to rob the Federal Reserve Building.

28.name: Sense and Sensibility
28.description: Rich Mr. Dashwood dies, leaving his second wife and her three daughters poor by the rules of inheritance. The two eldest daughters are the titular opposites.

29.name: The Brady Bunch Movie
29.description: The original '70s T.V. family is now placed in the 1990s, where they're even more square and out of place than ever.

30.name: Pocahontas
30.description: An English soldier and the daughter of an Algonquin chief share a romance when English colonists invade seventeenth-century Virginia.

31.name: Leaving Las Vegas
31.description: Ben Sanderson, a Hollywood screenwriter who lost everything because of his alcoholism, arrives in Las Vegas to drink himself to death. There, he meets and forms an uneasy friendship and non-interference pact with prostitute Sera.

32.name: Billy Madison
32.description: In order to inherit his fed up father's hotel empire, an immature and lazy man must repeat grades 1-12 all over again.

33.name: Major Payne
33.description: A recently discharged Major, finds himself commanding a group of mismatched Cadets.

34.name: Hackers
34.description: Hackers are blamed for making a virus that will capsize five oil tankers.

35.name: Tank Girl
35.description: A girl is among the few survivors of a dystopian Earth. Riding a war tank, she fights against the tyranny of a mega-corporation that dominates the remaining potable water supply of the planet.

36.name: Desperado
36.description: A gunslinger's embroiled in a war with a local drug runner.

37.name: Kôkaku Kidôtai
37.description: A cyborg policewoman and her partner hunt a mysterious and powerful hacker called the Puppet Master.

38.name: Tommy Boy
38.description: After his auto-parts tycoon father dies, the overweight, underachieving son teams up with a snide accountant to try and save the family business.

39.name: Four Rooms
39.description: Four interlocking tales that take place in a fading hotel on New Year's Eve.

40.name: To Wong Foo Thanks for Everything, Julie Newmar
40.description: Three drag queens travel cross-country until their car breaks down, leaving them stranded in a small town.

41.name: The American President
41.description: A widowed U.S. President running for reelection and an environmental lobbyist fall in love. It's all above-board, but "politics is perception," and sparks fly anyway.

42.name: Crimson Tide
42.description: On a U.S. nuclear missile sub, a young First Officer stages a mutiny, to prevent his trigger happy Captain from launching his missiles, before confirming his orders to do so.

43.name: Halloween: The Curse of Michael Myers
43.description: Six years after Michael Myers last terrorized Haddonfield, he returns there in pursuit of his niece, Jamie Lloyd, who has escaped with her newborn child, for which Michael and a mysterious cult have sinister plans.

44.name: La haine
44.description: 24 hours in the lives of three young men in the French suburbs the day after a violent riot.

45.name: The Basketball Diaries
45.description: A teenager finds his dreams of becoming a basketball star threatened after he free falls into the harrowing world of drug addiction.

46.name: It Takes Two
46.description: Alyssa and Amanda are two little girls who are identical, but complete strangers, that accidentally meet one day.

47.name: Babe
47.description: Babe, a pig raised by sheepdogs, learns to herd sheep with a little help from Farmer Hoggett.

48.name: Strange Days
48.description: A former cop turned street-hustler accidentally uncovers a conspiracy in Los Angeles in 1999.

49.name: Mallrats
49.description: Both dumped by their girlfriends, two best friends seek refuge in the local mall.

50.name: The Bridges of Madison County
50.description: Photographer Robert Kincaid (Clint Eastwood) wanders into the life of housewife Francesca Johnson (Meryl Streep), for four days in the 1960s.
